name: Affinity Photo Macros File
summary: An AFMACROS file contains a collection of macros created by Serif Affinity Photo, a raster graphic design application. It stores multiple macros, which a user can execute to perform a repetitive or complex task in Affinity Photo. AFMACROS files are similar to .AFMACRO files but contain multiple macros instead of only one.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
